Properties.Description:
Opinion Type is a larger classification of Opinions that enables them to be grouped for presentation or analysis.

Ex:
Opinion = recycling is important
Opinion Type = Environment Opinions

Opinion = organic foods are healthier
Opinion Type = food

Opinion = on-line banking is convenient
Opinion Type = bank services

Opinion = stocks are risk investments
Opinion Type = Investing

Opinion = cellular phone are safe to use
Opinion Type = cellular phone safety
